sample_docs: Attain Insight Solutions Inc. is an Ottawa-based organization that offers consulting services in Business Intelligence (BI), Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) and Data Warehousing for Government and private sector firms, who want to: increase their value to customers, stakeholders and partners obtain greater visibility into operations, finance and administration through the use of reporting, analysis, metrics, dashboards, business planning and forecasting, search, or geographical, information access solutions. Attain Insight focuses 100% of its business on BI, EPM and Data Warehousing with service options that include end-to-end management, augmentation, joint development and outsourcing. Most service providers do not have BI, EPM or Data Warehouse professionals on staff, offer only per diem rates, and provide little or no guarantee on services. Attain Insight specializes in fixed-price projects led by industry professionals with 15 or more years experience. BI/EPM and Data Warehouse vendor selection, evaluation and RFP preparation BI Migration/upgrade planning and implementation including Cognos PowerPlay and Cognos Impromptu Compliance services for global standards and best practice Business and technology roadmaps Design, development and implementation of robust or large scale BI/EPM and Data Warehouse solutions Migration/upgrade of complex Business Intelligence solutions BI/EPM and Data Warehouse solutions for IBM, SAP and Oracle applications Analysis solutions involving SAP/BW, MSAS, Essbase, IBM and Cognos Mixed planning, budgeting, forecasting and BI solutions Operational BI & EPM solutions with near real-time business or technical requirements Attain Insight Solutions Inc. 2-2026 Lanthier Dr., Suite 202, Ottawa, ON K4A-0N6 Canada Phone: +1 (613) 235-0200 Fax: +1 (888) 415-8001 2008 Selected by Cognos, an IBM Company, to provide advisory services to customers and partners

Business Analytics Complement your team with our deep expertise and wide range of Business Analytics services Security & Compliance Get robust control and security over your directory services and applications to reduce risk and streamline business operations Location Intelligence Discover deeper insights into your data by adding geospatial analytics to your business intelligence Identity & Biometrics Uncover hidden relationships within your data and protect privacy through high-fidelity biometric anonymization Complement your team with our deep expertise and wide range of Business Analytics services Get robust control and security over your directory services and applications to reduce risk and streamline business operations Discover deeper insights into your data by adding geospatial analytics to your business intelligence Uncover hidden relationships within your data and protect privacy through high-fidelity biometric anonymization Attain Insight Intrinsic™ is a unique identity solution that transforms how organizations uncover and understand relationships between entities in their data. By seamlessly integrating biometric and non-biometric data, Intrinsic provides a comprehensive approach to revealing hidden connections, threats, and opportunities within or outside an organization. Intrinsic's platform of modular components also offers innovative high-fidelity technology that anonymizes user-identifying information including biometrics, preserving match accuracy while mitigating privacy concerns, regulatory risks, and associated costs. Attain Insight Security 4X ® is an enterprise centralized security administration, access control and compliance management technology that allows you to manage complex security requirements and reduce your risk. Security 4X connects to all the major security authentication platforms including Apache LDAP, Google Identity Services, HCL Domino Directory, NetIQ eDirectory, Microsoft Active Directory and Okta. Security 4X streamlines operations by 90%, aids in planning and executing mass security changes, and provides a provable audit from day one. Attain Insight Map Intelligence TM is a location intelligence platform, plug and play with leading business analytic solutions, like IBM Cognos Analytics TM and SAP BusinessObjects and GIS platforms such as Esri ® ArcGIS to help uncover hidden insights in your data. Map Intelligence integrates both geospatial data and business intelligence data, with no programming required.
